Package org.codehaus.mojo.jdepend

Class JDependNoForkMojo

java.lang.Object
org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
org.apache.maven.reporting.AbstractMavenReport
org.codehaus.mojo.jdepend.AbstractJDependMojo
org.codehaus.mojo.jdepend.JDependNoForkMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo, org.apache.maven.reporting.MavenMultiPageReport, org.apache.maven.reporting.MavenReport
@Mojo(name="generate-no-fork", defaultPhase=SITE) public class JDependNoForkMojo extends AbstractJDependMojo
Run JDepend and generate a site report. Goal which generate the JDepend metrics.
Author:
Karl-Heinz Marbaise
